lines.text: Oh, forgive me, Superintendent, but I hope you don't wa... how should I put it?... find me irratating.

[In a condescendingly emphatic tone]
Dismiss the thought, Miss Marple!
Oh, good. I'm so glad. Thank you... yes.

[Trying to get a loose end cleared up]
But WHY did she?
Ask Miss Marple. She usually has the right answers.
We are not put in this world to avoid danger - not when an innocent person's life is at stake!
When gentlemen of a certain age fall in love, they get the disease very badly.
